definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
the objective world (as opposed to empirical observation)

pinyin: ke4 guan1 wei2 xin1 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to objective conditions.
sentences.chinese: 他把失敗歸咎於客觀條件。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的進一步探討客觀評價大鼠心肌缺血模型的指標。

sentences.english: Aural tests are objective and can be graded mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 聽力測驗是客觀的，可以機械地評分。

sentences.english: The fifth part introduced the announcement system construction of objective incapability of procedure of execution.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分介紹了客觀執行不能宣告制度的構建。

sentences.english: The fourth part introduced the precondition of solution to objective incapability of procedure of execution.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分介紹瞭解決客觀執行不能問題的先決條件。

sentences.english: Knowledge is a cognizance of basic impersonality.
sentences.chinese: 知識是一種具有客觀基礎的認知。

sentences.english: Making the law by judges has its necessity and objectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 法官制法有其必要性和客觀性。

sentences.english: Journalists in the United States strive to achieve objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，新聞工作者力爭做到客觀。

sentences.english: The "looking back" literature and art is an objective social subsistent.
sentences.chinese: 後顧性文藝是社會的客觀存在。

sentences.english: The social aspects of religion are often the most subordinated to objective study.
sentences.chinese: 宗教的社會方面對客觀的研究來說經常是最次要的。
科學是論述客觀事實的。

sentences.english: I hope over time that people recognize that we are objective and independent.
sentences.chinese: 我希望人們最終能認識到，我們是獨立而客觀的。

sentences.english: The value orientation and objective effect of Liang Qichao's thought in popularization.
sentences.chinese: 梁啓超大衆化文學思想的價值取向與客觀效果。

sentences.english: Normal of the hoarseness were provided for clinical measurement.
sentences.chinese: 爲臨牀提供聲音嘶啞的客觀指標。

sentences.english: As to the subjective and objective conditions in Kiangsi, they well deserve our attention.
sentences.chinese: 至於江西的主觀客觀條件是很值得注意的。

sentences.english: Thus, to enable the emergence of modern pre-school education, with the objective needs.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，就使近代學前教育的產生，有了客觀的需要。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
